description: The housing department needs digital mail and printing services for different departments, including digital and physical mail distribution and printing, digitization, and document management. The purpose of this RFI is to determine the current market capabilities and to define the requirements for a future RFI.
tags: Canada-Europe Agreement on Comprehensive Economic and Trade
full_summary:
## Request for Information and Expression of Interest for Digital Mail and Printing Services

### Tender Title and Reference
* Title: Request for Information and Expression of Interest for Digital Mail and Printing Services
* Reference: cb-7851-56949214

### Overview
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified suppliers to respond to this Request for Information (RFI) and Expression of Interest (EOI) for digital mail and printing services.

### Tender Scope

CMHC seeks industry input on their capabilities to provide digital mail and printing services for two distinct streams:

* Stream A: Onsite services at CMHC, including digital mail and distribution, shipping and receiving, digitization, document management, and required technology.
* Stream B: Offsite services at third-party provider locations, including printing, reproduction and finishing, technology requirements, and more.

### Tender Procedure
This RFI is an informal process to gather information and input from the industry to determine market capabilities and define CMHC's requirements for a potential subsequent Request for Proposal (RFP) process.

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: August 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 11, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: September 11, 2023

### Contact Information

* Name: Daniela C. Michaud
* Email: dcmichau@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 740-4203

### Tenders Documents
Tender documents are available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7851/rfi-002211-digital-mail-and-print-services_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7851/rfi-002211-digital-mail-and-print-services_en.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7851/rfi-002211-digital-mail-and-print-services_fr_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7851/rfi-002211-digital-mail-and-print-services_fr_0.pdf)

### Notice

This RFI is not a formal solicitation and is not valid as a bid. Suppliers responding to this RFI and EOI must indicate their expressions of interest in accordance with the tender schedule.

CMHC (Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
